title: Fiddlesticks need a rework srsly
body:
I havent seen a fiddlesticks for a whole season...no one likes him.
i've seen more wukongs than fiddlesticks...

replies.body:
he's fun, he's just not especially in the meta because of current items and the types of items and champions that riot has been pushing.

Riot has been pushing assassins and tanks in the jungle for game health, since whenever ap jungle itemisation moves away from burst and makes taking short range mages, you begin to encounter problems with significant differences in jungle clearspeed since mages have the potential for unfairly fast clears, and you also encounter the problem of laners trying to abuse jungle ap items.

Fiddles is likely the jungler who is most reliant on these specific types of itemisation, and he requires alot of gold to scale, with no intermediary items, fiddles has a hard time earlygame, which is a very important part of the meta atm, since we are in a very midgame centric meta, but when the meta changes and ap jungle itemisation balance problems are solved, he could quite viably return to being a meta pick, without the need for an overhaul.

Fiddles would excel well with better ap intermediary items for the jungle and a shift to a lategame meta, but he doesn't need a rework, similar to other nonmeta picks, he's waiting for the meta to shift.
i played fiddle mid last season and it was fun as fuck.

He has 2 buffs on the PBE right now. E has lower cooldown and does more damage to jungle. R has lower cooldown.

There is also a full rework of AP items on the PBE right now which may help him out.

Fiddle actually has a higher pick rate than Elise right now. So that says it all about AP junglers.
